text: The Intruder () is a 2017 Italian drama film directed by Leonardo Di Costanzo. It was screened in the Directors' Fortnight section at the 2017 Cannes Film Festival. ==Cast== * Marcello Fonte * Raffaella Giordano ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 drama films Category:Italian films Category:Italian drama films Category:Italian-language films
title: The Intruder (2017 film)
